member.name: F:Microsoft.CampusCommunity.Api.Authorization.AuthorizedPermissions.DelegatedPermissionsForActions
member.summary: Contains the allowed delegated permissions for each action. If the caller has one of the allowed ones, they should be allowed to perform the action.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CampusCommunity.Api.Authorization.AuthorizedPermissions.ApplicationPermissionsForActions
member.summary: Contains the allowed application permissions for each action. If the caller has one of the allowed ones, they should be allowed to perform the action.
